entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
